info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 9:16PM CDT until June 03 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL HIDALGO AND CENTRAL STARR COUNTIES... At 915 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Citrus City, or 7 miles north of La Joya, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Mission, Pharr, Rio Grande City, Hidalgo, Palmview, Penitas, Sullivan City, La Joya and Palmhurst. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
